name: Renewal
description: All allies within three hexes of the caster have their abilities restored.  Up to 2 points plus 1 point per 2 caster levels of temporary or permanent attribute penalties are removed.  The number of points negated is a total per target across all Attributes.  Temporary penalties are negated first.

upgrades.description: With Restore Morale, Renewal now also negates the effects of spells which penalize Attack, Attack Cost, Defense, Armor Penalty, Skill Checks, Resistances, and Spell Failure.  Up to 5 points plus 1 point per 2 caster levels of penalties in each category are negated.
With Remove Paralysis, all effects causing immobilization or helplessness, including sleep and paralysis, are immediately removed from all targets
